name: understanding-transpilers-and-bundlers
description: Playground to understand the code generated from different transpilers.
author: nosolosw

scripts.do:arrow-functions:closure: google-closure-compiler src/arrow-functions/source.js --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > src/arrow-functions/source.closure.js
scripts.do:export-default:closure: google-closure-compiler src/export-default/source.js --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > src/export-default/source.closure.js
scripts.do:export-named:closure: google-closure-compiler src/export-named/source.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > src/export-named/source.closure.js
scripts.do:export:closure: google-closure-compiler src/export/source.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > src/export/source.closure.js
scripts.do:import-default:closure: google-closure-compiler src/import-default/source.js src/export-default/source.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > src/import-default/source.closure.js
scripts.do:import-named:closure: google-closure-compiler src/import-named/source.js src/export-named/source.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > src/import-named/source.closure.js
scripts.do:import:closure: google-closure-compiler src/import/source.js src/export/source.js src/export-default/source.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > src/import/source.closure.js
